errors.emailPassword: The email or password is incorrect. Please retry

result.title: Payment initiated
result.text: Thanks for your time, {{payer}}. The payment of the invoice from {{payee}} {{id}} for {{price}} is initiated. It may take a few minutes for the payment to be processed. We will send you an email once the payment is complete.
